name: Kaedehara Kazuha
desc:
Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves: Kaedehara Kazuha

Flowers and birds are a dear pleasure to one winding under the moonlight.

value.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
value.desc:
Kaedehara Kazuha: Poetics of Fuubutsu

There is something elegant about this match.

If nothing else, both sides may concede defeat without regrets.

value.text: Reward for inviting Kaedehara Kazuha to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
value.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc:
Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves: Kaedehara Kazuha

Flowers and birds are a dear pleasure to one winding under the moonlight.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"The enjoyment one gets from playing this game of cards does not pale in the face of wine, tea, or swordplay..."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Kaedehara Kazuha's deck specializes in using various card combinations to Switch characters efficiently, while using Summons and the Swirl reaction to trigger Elemental Reactions frequently.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , attaches <color=#ffffff>Midare Ranzan</color> to this character.
If this skill triggers Swirl, <color=#ffffff>Midare Ranzan</color> is converted to the Swirled Element.
<color=#ffffff>After the Skill DMG is finalized</color> : Your team switches to the next character.
<color=#ece5d8>Midare Ranzan</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>The next time you use Switch Character to switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> This switch is considered a <color=#ffffff>Fast Action</color> rather than a <color=#ffffff>Combat Action</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Before you choose an action:</color> If the character to which this is attached is your active character, they immediately use a Normal Attack. The <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> this Normal Attack would deal is converted to <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . Once finalized, this effect is removed.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> and summons <color=#ffffff>Autumn Whirlwind</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your Characters or Summons trigger a Swirl reaction:</color> Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the element Swirled. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Fast Action</color>
You can continue with other actions after conducting 1 Fast Action.
Only after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
